title: BRIEF-Pace says combination with Arris to occur in late Dec or Q1 2016
text:
BRIEF-Pace says combination with Arris to occur in late Dec or Q1 2016 
Oct 22 Pace Plc 
* All of resolutions therein proposed to approve scheme and related matters were duly passed today at court meeting and general meeting 
* Subject to court sanction, combination is expected to occur in late december 2015 or q1 of 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: Trending On Reuters
